allow:
Bash(powershell -Command "
# Start app in background
$job = Start-Process -FilePath ''python'' -ArgumentList ''test_dom_check.py'' -PassThru -WindowStyle Hidden
Start-Sleep -Seconds 15

try {
    # Run playwright check
    python -c @''
from playwright.sync_api import sync_playwright
import time

with sync_playwright\(\) as p:
    browser = p.chromium.launch\(headless=True\)
    page = browser.new_page\(\)
    
    try:
        page.goto\(""http://localhost:8558"", timeout=30000\)
        page.wait_for_load_state\(""networkidle"", timeout=20000\)
        time.sleep\(5\)
        
        print\(""=== DOM Structure ===""\)
        
        canvas = page.locator\(""canvas""\)
        print\(f""Canvas elements: {canvas.count\(\)}""\)
        
        semantics = page.locator\(""flt-semantics""\)
        print\(f""flt-semantics elements: {semantics.count\(\)}""\)
        
        aria = page.locator\(""[aria-label]""\)
        print\(f""[aria-label] elements: {aria.count\(\)}""\)
        
        role = page.locator\(""[role]""\)
        print\(f""[role] elements: {role.count\(\)}""\)
        
        if aria.count\(\) > 0:
            print\(\)
            print\(""=== Elements with aria-label ===""\)
            for i in range\(min\(aria.count\(\), 40\)\):
                elem = aria.nth\(i\)
                label = elem.get_attribute\(""aria-label""\)
                tag = elem.evaluate\(""el => el.tagName""\)
                print\(f""  {tag}: label={label}""\)
                
    except Exception as e:
        print\(f""Error: {e}""\)
    finally:
        browser.close\(\)
''@
} finally {
    Stop-Process -Id $job.Id -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
}
")
